name: Galactic Odyssey
description:
Simple 3D platformer project developed with Unity as part of the Game Design and Development course offered by the Michigan State University.

The following modifications were added to the base project:

1. Added instructions for playing the game in the Main Menu.

2. Created two unique levels with different settings and goals.

3. Implemented a level completion system with different requirements for each level.

The game is best played with the downloadable Windows build available below.

Created by Eduardo Pavanatti
